recommended_degree: Informatika, Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Komputer, Statistik, Matematika (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Support the team in building and maintaining data pipelines (ETL/ELT) to serve various business needs.
- Assist in collecting and processing data from multiple sources such as SQL databases, APIs, and cloud platforms.
- Help automate processes and optimize data workflows to improve efficiency and reliability.
- Assist the team in performing data cleansing and data quality checks to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
- Contribute to analyzing and documenting data pipelines to improve process visibility and operational efficiency.
- Support the team in conducting root cause analysis for data discrepancies or inconsistencies.
- Contribute to the implementation of data security and data separation across various storage platforms.
- Collaborate with engineering, product, and leadership teams to identify and resolve data-related issues.
